sentence.Network_en: " Don't shove me,'said one of the strikers, determinedly. " I'm not doing anything. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 别推我, "其中的一个罢工工人坚决地说, " 我可没干什么. ”

sentence.Network_en: Dorothy's chin set determinedly as she looked calmly at him.
sentence.Network_cn: 多萝西平静地看着他,下巴绷得紧紧的,看来是打定主意了.

entry.tran: 下定决心的;决意的;坚定的
entry.def: If you are determined to do something, you have made a firm decision to do it and will not let anything stop you.

example.ex: His enemies are determined to ruin him...
example.tran: 他的敌人决意要毁了他。

example.ex: She is a remarkably adroit and determined politician...
example.tran: 她是一位精明干练且意志坚定的政治家。

means.word_mean: 2. in an ambitious and energetic manner;

auth_sentence.content: They both determinedly source from local producers too.
auth_sentence.res_content: They both determinedly source from local producers too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They both determinedly source from local producers too.

auth_sentence.content: Carey's novel is determinedly unpolitical to a political degree.
auth_sentence.res_content: Carey's novel is determinedly unpolitical to a political degree.

auth_sentence.content: "What you're doing now," Grace said determinedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "What you're doing now," Grace said determinedly.
